title: Executive Order 5268-Amending the Composition of the Board of Surveys and Maps
content: The composition of the Board of Surveys and Maps created by Executive Order No. 3206, of December 30, 1919, is hereby amended by the addition of the Bureau of Lighthouses, Department of Commerce.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5268-Amending the Composition of the Board of Surveys and Maps Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361125
